title: Mea culpa
author: VD
content_html:
A poster at the Right-Wing News wonders at the inclusion of a certain commentator on the Right-of-Center Bloggers List Their Least Favorite People on the Right:

I am suprised to see Malkin on this list. I wonder why she made the list.

In part, because I get a vote. Although I was pleased to see that four other right-wing bloggers view her equally askance. That’s a step forward from last year, when she didn’t even make the list. Three others for whom I voted and did not make the cut were Bill Kristol, Ben Shapiro and John Podhoretz.

I do note my chagrin at forgetting to vote for Andrew Sullivan and Bill O’Reilly. I can only suppose that my subconscious no longer considers them to even nominally belong to the political Right.
content_text:
A poster at the Right-Wing News wonders at the inclusion of a certain commentator on the
Right-of-Center Bloggers List Their Least Favorite People on the Right
:
I am suprised to see Malkin on this list. I wonder why she made the list.
In part, because I get a vote.  Although I was pleased to see that four other right-wing bloggers view her equally askance.  That’s a step forward from last year, when she didn’t even make the list.  Three others for whom I voted and did not make the cut were Bill Kristol, Ben Shapiro and John Podhoretz.
I do note my chagrin at forgetting to vote for Andrew Sullivan and Bill O’Reilly.  I can only suppose that my subconscious no longer considers them to even nominally belong to the political Right.
